rows.label: tlk70000052_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Adel-sama has been so kind to me
ever since we first met.

rows.label: tlk70000052_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Like when I was cleaning the roof
of the mansion and slipped and fell.

rows.label: tlk70000052_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Or after I carelessly got that electric
shock in the kitchen. He was so worried
and nursed me back to health.

rows.label: tlk70000052_01_msg0004
rows.name: He got me back on my feet in no time!

rows.label: tlk70000052_01_msg0005
rows.name:
But they were just little mishaps. Not
like Adel-sama's serious wounds. It's
what got me into medicine, y'know.

rows.label: tlk70000052_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Adel-sama will tell you himself that
you can't overdo things. You've only
one life to live after all!
